general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply 200 kg of FYM, 4 kg of DAP, 2.5 kg of MOP and 1 kg of Zinc sulphate during last puddling. Divide nursery area into smaller plots of convenient length. Irrigation channels of size 30 cm in width should be made along the beds for irrigation/drainage purpose. Sprouted Seeds should be sown @ 40-50 g/m2 area of seed bed by Treat the paddy seeds with Carbendazim 50% W.P @ 1.5 g/1kg of seeds or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5 % @ 3 g /1 kg of seeds before sowing in the nursery.

Treat the paddy seeds with Carbendazim 50% W.P @ 1.5 g/1kg of seeds or Carboxin 37.5% + Thiram 37.5 % @ 3 g /1 kg of seeds before sowing in the nursery.
Monitor and manage the picking of cotton crop as needed.
Monitor and manage the harvesting and planting of sugarcane.
Continuing the harvesting of Rabi crops like Cereals.
Continuing the harvesting of Rabi crops like Pulses.
Continuing the harvesting of Rabi crops like Oilseeds.
Continuing the harvesting of Rabi crops like Spices.
Continuing the harvesting of Rabi crops like Vegetables.
Control yellow mosaic virus by spraying triazophos @ 400 ml/acre or Acetamipride @ 40 g per acre.
Control yellow mosaic virus by spraying triazophos @ 400 ml/acre or Acetamipride @ 40 g per acre.
In view of high humid condition, manage wilting with Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2g/ltr of water.
Install pheromone traps to monitor Fruit & Shoot borer populations.
To manage Alternaria leaf spot disease in Cole crops spray Mancozeb 75 % WP @ 600-g/acre by mixing in 200 liter of water.
Remove wilted plants from the field and manage aphids and Jassids infestation by spraying Imidachloprid 17.8% SL @ 1 ml/lt.
Control leaf eating caterpillar biologically by using Pheromone traps or chemical control with Chlorpyriphos 50 % + Cypermethrin E.C @ 400 ml/acre.
